Data: Faulkner to Morgan, no run rolls in the slightly slower ball towards the stumps, Morgan looks to work it on leg but doesn't time it well
Faulkner to Morgan, no run fuller and angled in towards middle and leg, pushes it down to mid on
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run comes down the track and clips the ball off the pads to fine leg for one
Faulkner to Bopara, 1 run back of length and angling away from outside off, Bopara defends it with soft hands on the leg side for a quick one
Faulkner to Morgan, no run full and straight on off, driven down to mid off off the front foot
Faulkner to Morgan, FOUR runs on length but it's too wide and Morgan reaches out to drive it square of the wicket in the gap for four
Cummins to Bopara, 1 wide short ball down the leg side for a wide
Cummins to Bopara, 1 run angled in towards the stumps, Bopara helps it down to fine leg for one
Cummins to Morgan, no run fullish outside off, guides it to point with an open face of the bat
Cummins to Morgan, no run right on target on the off stump, Morgan stays back and defends on the off side

Cummins to Morgan, FOUR runs short ball this time and Morgan plays the ramp shot well over the slip fielders and wide of third man for a one-bounce four. Waited for it and timed it very well to place it in the gap
Cummins to Morgan, no run length delivery on the off stump, he defends it back
Cummins to Morgan, no run length delivery angled across outside off, Morgan pushes it to cover point
Maxwell to Bopara, 1 run on middle and leg and it's clipped towards square leg for one
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run length delivery around off with a hint of turn, steered off the back foot to sweeper cover
Maxwell to Bopara, 2 runs fullish on off and middle, Bopara paddles it fine on the leg side for two
Maxwell to Bopara, 1 run flighted outside the leg stump, driven with the turn to deep midwicket for one
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run goes back in the crease and helps the ball to the leg side for one
Maxwell to Bopara, 2 byes that's beaten the batsman and the keeper for byes. It was full outside off, beat the outside edge and went past the keeper for two
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run fullish on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
Cummins to Bopara, 1 run short of length and well outside off, guides it late to third man for one
Cummins to Morgan, no run short of length again but no room this time - it was on off and Morgan defended it back
Cummins to Morgan, no run touch wider outside off, steered to point this time
Cummins to Morgan, no run on the pads this time, but clipped straight to midwicket

Cummins to Morgan, (no ball) oh, that must have slipped out of his hand! It was a beamer well over Morgan's head, but wide too outside off and it went straight to Watson at slip, who dropped it! Given a no ball, not wide
Cummins to Morgan, no run bouncer on the leg side, Morgan leaves this one too, thinking it's a wide, but not given
Maxwell to Bopara, no run flighted around off, driven to cover
Maxwell to Bopara, no run touch shorter on the stumps, he goes back and works it to midwicket
Maxwell to Bopara, no run goes back and makes room this time to push it to cover
Maxwell to Bopara, 1 run makes room again and cuts it to the left of cover for one
Maxwell to Morgan, no run flighted on middle and leg, defended on the leg side off the front foot
Maxwell to Morgan, FOUR runs bit of room on offer outside off, Morgan rocks back to make room and cuts it fiercely to the third man area for four. That's drinks
Doherty to Bopara, 1 run fullish outside off, pushed into the covers for a quick one
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot into the covers for one

Doherty to Bopara, OUT another bowler has struck in his first over, Bopara gone this time! It was short outside off, Bopara went back and cut it straight to Maxwell at backward point for a straightforward catch
Doherty to Buttler, no run driven back to the bowler from the crease, off the middle
Doherty to Buttler, no run stays back and dabs the flat and straight ball on the leg side
Doherty to Buttler, 2 runs speared into the pads and Buttler gets going with a neat tuck through square leg
Watson to Morgan, no run good length on a tight line from over the wicket, Morgan stays in his crease and defends
Watson to Morgan, 1 run that's not that short with just a bit of width outside off, Morgan gets down low and slashes, cutting the ball down to third man
Watson to Buttler, no run good length on off stump, Buttler gets behind the line and blocks from his crease

Watson to Buttler, no run that kept a low outside off, Buttler was beaten between bat and body and that was so close to off stump. The ball almost passed below the bottom of the bat as Buttler drove at it
Watson to Buttler, no run defended back to the bowler

Watson to Buttler, 3 runs sensational stuff on the boundary from Warner. Buttler had pulled the short ball powerfully towards deep midwicket and Warner sprinted a long way to his left before putting in the full length dive to save the boundary. He's made a mess of the boundary rope though, but it looks clean
Doherty to Buttler, no run defended on the off side
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Doherty to Morgan, no run Morgan takes a stride out and blocks
Doherty to Morgan, no run Morgan unfurls the reverse sweep but doesn't make proper contact
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run moves a long way across his stumps and flicks the ball from middle and leg behind square
Doherty to Buttler, no run good length on of and middle, Buttler opens up his stance but ends up defending because he is cramped for room
Watson to Morgan, 1 run width outside off again for Morgan and he opens the face of the bat to run the ball to third man
Watson to Buttler, no run good length on middle and off, Buttler stays back, gets behind the line and defends on the off side
Watson to Buttler, no run short of a length and a bit wider outside off stump, Buttler chooses to let it pass
Watson to Buttler, 1 run Buttler pushes towards mid off and runs, he has to dive to make his ground, but the throw from Doherty misses the stumps
Watson to Morgan, FOUR runs Morgan comes on the front foot and lofts the length ball through the line, hitting it straight of the fielder at mid-off and finding the boundary
Watson to Morgan, no run tries to cut but gets a bottom edge that goes to the keeper on the bounce
Doherty to Buttler, no run defended on the front foot on the off side
Doherty to Buttler, no run tight line and length, on off and middle from round the wicket into the right-hander, Buttler blocks
Doherty to Buttler, no run defended on the front foot again
Doherty to Buttler, no run played with an open face towards point
Doherty to Buttler, 2 runs leans forward this time to play the ball on the off side but gets a bit of an edge that runs towards third man
Doherty to Buttler, no run defended on the front foot on the leg side
Starc to Morgan, no run outside the off stump on length, left alone for the keeper
Starc to Morgan, no run closer to off stump on length, pushed into the covers this time
Starc to Morgan, no run short and wide outside off as it swings away, left alone easily
Starc to Morgan, 3 runs fullish this time outside off, pushed through the covers in the gap for three runs
Starc to Buttler, no run angled across the batsman outside off, left for the keeper
Starc to Buttler, 1 run on off on good length with the angle, helped to third man for one to end the over
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run fullish on the off stump, pushed down the ground to long off
Doherty to Morgan, no run moves across towards off and clips the ball from middle and leg to midwicket
Doherty to Morgan, 2 runs moves across towards off again and paddles it fine down the leg side for two
Doherty to Morgan, no run moves back and across in the crease to defend the ball back to the bowler
Doherty to Morgan, no run comes down the track and pushes the ball to Doherty
Doherty to Morgan, no run waits for this one on middle and leg and helps it to midwicket
Starc to Buttler, no run right on target on the off stump on length, Buttler defends solidly
Starc to Buttler, no run back of length on the middle stump, Buttler goes back and defends it

Starc to Buttler, 1 run in the air dangerously and it's safe as it goes past point! Again drivable length well outside off, Buttler chased at it without much footwork and drove uppishly. Luckily for him it was far from point
Starc to Morgan, no run fullish to Morgan now, he pushes it down the ground to mid on
Starc to Morgan, no run swinging in this time from outside off, it was a length delivery, and Morgan got an inside edge onto his pad after it nipped it
Starc to Morgan, no run bangs in the bouncer towards the batsman who ducks under it
Doherty to Buttler, no run bit slow and coming in towards the stumps, Buttler blocks it back
Doherty to Buttler, 1 wide strays down the leg side now for a wide

Doherty to Buttler, 3 runs bit too wide outside off and Buttler cuts it fiercely through the off side off the back foot. It would have gone for four but Warner chased it like there was a shark after him and saved one with a slide
Doherty to Morgan, no run takes a step forward and pushes the ball back to Doherty
Doherty to Morgan, no run length delivery around off, pushed back to the bowler
Doherty to Morgan, no run full on the pads now, pushed to midwicket this time
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run shorter on middle and leg, Morgan goes back and punches it down to long on for one
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run towards the pads and clipped to square leg for one
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run fullish this time now, driven down between mid on and mid off for one
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run well outside off, he waits for it to guide it to third man for one
Faulkner to Buttler, no run angles across the slower ball outside off as Buttler pokes and misses
Faulkner to Buttler, no run waits for this one and defends the ball towards point
Faulkner to Buttler, no run fullish around off, pushed into the covers
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run goes back in the crease and works the ball to leg from middle and leg for one
Doherty to Buttler, no run flighted outside off and he reverse sweeps it straight to short third man
Doherty to Buttler, no run length delivery outside off, defends it back to the bowler
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run on the pads now and it's swept to fine leg for one
Doherty to Morgan, no run flighted on middle stump, helped with the turn to midwicket
Doherty to Morgan, 1 leg bye slightly shorter on middle, worked to fine leg off the back foot for one
Faulkner to Morgan, 2 runs just wide of backward point! It was shortish outside off, he cut it off the back foot and it was just wide of point to go to third man for two
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run around length to Morgan, pushed down to mid off for one
Faulkner to Buttler, no run angled across on the off stump, he defends it on the off side
Faulkner to Buttler, no run back of length on middle, defends it back this time
Faulkner to Buttler, no run angled across again around off, defended on the off side
Faulkner to Buttler, no run length delivery on off again, defends it with soft hands for one but comes back in time to avoid a run out
Doherty to Morgan, no run goes back and works the length delivery to midwicket
Doherty to Morgan, no run tight line and length again, defends the ball back to Doherty from off
Doherty to Morgan, no run outside off this time, pushed off the back foot into the covers
Doherty to Morgan, no run straightish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler again
Doherty to Morgan, no run on length on the off stump, Morgan defends it back to Doherty again
Doherty to Morgan, 1 wide strays down the leg side for a wide
Doherty to Morgan, no run on the middle stump on length, defended back to end the over
Faulkner to Buttler, no run length delivery on the stumps, Buttler defends it back
Faulkner to Buttler, no run touch shorter on the stumps, defends it off the back foot
Faulkner to Buttler, no run bit wide outside off with the angle, steered towards point
Faulkner to Buttler, no run goes across and works the ball straight to midwicket
Faulkner to Buttler, no run back of length on the stumps, pushed down to mid off
Faulkner to Buttler, no run touch wide outside off, steered off the back foot to backward point
Doherty to Morgan, no run flighted on the leg stump, clipped to midwicket
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run on leg again and he paddles it fine and in the air for one behind square on leg
Doherty to Buttler, 3 runs outside off and Buttler reverse sweeps it in the gap between point and short third man but Faulkner runs a long way to slide and saves one
Doherty to Morgan, no run fullish on the stumps, pushed down to mid on
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run flighted on middle stump, driven down to long on for one
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run length delivery on off, swept against the turn to fine leg for one
Faulkner to Buttler, 1 run fullish on leg stump, pushed down past the bowler for a quick single
Faulkner to Morgan, 2 runs fullish on Morgan's pads now, clipped behind square leg off the legs in the gap
Faulkner to Morgan, no run length delivery outside off, worked to point off the back foot
Faulkner to Morgan, no run slightly slower on the off stump, pushed down the ground
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run his back of the hand delivery, pitched outside off and got some extra bounce to surprise Morgan as he took his eyes off the ball
Faulkner to Buttler, no run on length on off now, he defends it back
Doherty to Morgan, no run goes back and across to work the ball on leg
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run stays back and sweeps the ball from leg to fine leg and that's the 50 partnership
Doherty to Buttler, no run on length on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run goes shorter on the off stump and he paddles it behind square on leg for one
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run fullish on the stumps and he drives it down to long for one
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run comes down the track and drives it to long off for one

Maxwell to Buttler, no run dropped by Haddin! It was a wide delivery outside off, Buttler cut it late and the ball went towards the gloves after a thick edge but it was a tough chance because it hit the outside of the gloves
Maxwell to Buttler, 1 run flight on off stump, driven down to long on for one
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run flighted on off, worked down to long off for one
Maxwell to Buttler, no run that one kept low after pitching outside off as Buttler went back to cut but missed
Maxwell to Buttler, 2 runs driven down to long on where a fumble from Starc gives them two runs
Maxwell to Buttler, no run fullish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Doherty to Morgan, no run goes back in the crease to work the ball to midwicket
Doherty to Morgan, SIX runs charges down the track to take it on the full and lofts it down the ground over long off for six to bring up his fifty
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, worked down to mid on for a quick one
Doherty to Buttler, 1 run stifled appeal from Doherty for lbw as he paddled it to the leg side
Doherty to Morgan, 1 run length delivery is worked to mid on for one
Doherty to Buttler, no run flighted outside off, he blocks it back and that's drinks
Faulkner to Morgan, no run from back of the hand on off stump, he defends it back
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run angled in towards the batsman, worked off the back foot to the leg side for one
Faulkner to Buttler, no run full outside off, driven straight to cover

Faulkner to Buttler, OUT one more for Faulkner, he gets Buttler this time! Angled it across outside the off stump, Buttler drove it up and high in the air and Warner at sweeper cover took a couple of steps to take a simple catch
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run slightly slower towards the stumps, Morgan helps it behind square on leg for one
Faulkner to Woakes, no run towards middle and leg, Woakes flicks it on leg, just wide of short midwicket
Cummins to Morgan, FOUR runs short and wide, Morgan gets room and he slaps it between point and cover point for a cracking four!
Cummins to Morgan, 2 runs short on the leg side now, worked off the hips to fine leg for two
Cummins to Morgan, 2 runs towards the pads again, worked on the leg side pat midwicket for two more
Cummins to Morgan, no run slower bouncer towards the batsman who goes on his toes to defend it
Cummins to Morgan, no run the extra pace on the short ball surprises him and there's no room as Morgan didn't move much and took it on his shoulder
Cummins to Morgan, no run length delivery on middle and off, pushed into the covers
Faulkner to Woakes, 2 runs length delivery on middle and leg, clipped over midwicket in the gap for two
Faulkner to Woakes, no run angled across outside off, steered straight to point
Faulkner to Woakes, 1 run wider outside off and he guides it to third man for one
Faulkner to Morgan, FOUR runs strays towards the leg side and Morgan flicks it away off the pads past short fine leg for four in the gap
Faulkner to Morgan, no run full and wide, punched straight into the covers
Faulkner to Morgan, no run length delivery towards off stump, Morgan leans forward and blocks
Cummins to Woakes, 1 run dropped at fine leg! Woakes merely lofted the ball in the air off his hips, straight to Doherty but he put down a simple catch
Cummins to Morgan, no run drifts down the leg side, stifled appeal as the ball takes some pad before reaching the keeper
Cummins to Morgan, FOUR runs further down leg and Morgan gets a chance to glance it fine down the leg side for four more! Some loose deliveries coming from Cummins
Cummins to Morgan, no run good comeback - length delivery outside off is left alone
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run on middle and leg, worked off the pads to the leg side for one
Cummins to Woakes, no run he wanted to work it on leg but was beaten by pace and the ball ended up on the pitch after an edge
Maxwell to Morgan, no run darts it in from middle stump, Morgan defends on the off side
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run on the stumps again, he makes room to find the gap this time on off for one
Maxwell to Woakes, 1 run full outside off, Woakes drives powerfully and the cover fielder gets a hand to it to keep it to one
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run outside off, cut off the back foot for one on the off side
Maxwell to Woakes, 1 run bit too wide outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
Maxwell to Morgan, no run length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
Cummins to Woakes, no run beaten outside off, Haddin thought he edged it, but umpire says no! It was a short ball outside off, Woakes went on his toes to poke and didn't get a whiff
Cummins to Woakes, 1 run towards the pads now and clipped in the air for one to square leg
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run slightly slower and on back of length, he defends off the back foot
Cummins to Woakes, no run full with some room, driven powerfully, but straight to point
Cummins to Woakes, 1 run short ball and it's pulled powerfully, but straight to deep midwicket for one
Cummins to Morgan, 1 wide slower bouncer goes over Morgan and it's called a wide
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run short ball just down leg, defended towards midwicket for a quick single
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run comes down and nearly yorks himself, but pushes it down towards mid on for one
Maxwell to Woakes, OUT Woakes has given it away! Pretty innocuous delivery on middle and leg, Woakes went back and worked it to leg but in the air and straight to midwicket for an easy-peasy catch
Maxwell to Jordan, no run wide outside off and pretty full, reaches out and drives it to point
Maxwell to Jordan, 1 run presses forward and pushes the length delivery to point, this time for a quick single even though Jordan took off late
Maxwell to Morgan, no run length delivery on off stump, defended off the back foot
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run towards middle and leg now, worked off the back foot to leg for one
Starc to Morgan, no run swings it in from outside off, Morgan blocks it back
Starc to Morgan, no run on length and wider outside off, pushed down to mid on this time
Starc to Morgan, 1 wide bouncer goes over Morgan's head and it's left alone for a wide
Starc to Morgan, 1 run swinging into the pads, attempted yorker is a low full toss, and clipped to deep square leg for one
Starc to Jordan, 1 run length delivery on the off stump, defended off the back foot on off for a quick single
Starc to Morgan, 1 run bangs in the short one outside off, Morgan works it down with soft hands for one on off
Starc to Jordan, no run fullish on the off stump, Jordan defends on the leg side
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run slightly short and wide, chopped off the back foot to deep point for one
Maxwell to Jordan, 1 run outside off with the angle, cut late off the back foot for one to short third man
Maxwell to Morgan, SIX runs that's gone a long way, and all the way! He came down the track and smacked it over the long on boundary for a massive six!
Maxwell to Morgan, FOUR runs outside off this time and he drives it inside out with a lot of power over the covers in the gap for four
Maxwell to Morgan, 1 run towards the leg side now, he tries to slap it on leg but gets an edge behind square for one
Maxwell to Jordan, 2 runs outside the off stump, chopped off the back foot wide of third man for two
Starc to Morgan, no run slightly full outside off, pushed down the ground to mid off
Starc to Morgan, 1 run attempted yorker on the pads, flicked to deep square leg for one
Starc to Jordan, no run extra bounce surprises Jordan as he is squared up by the short of length delivery and it fell just short of point
Starc to Jordan, no run ducks under the bouncer this time on middle and leg
Starc to Jordan, 2 runs bit too full outside off, driven to sweeper cover for two
Starc to Jordan, no run length delivery angled across outside off is left alone
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run goes back a bit and works the short of length ball to the leg side for one
Faulkner to Jordan, no run length delivery on the stumps, it's defended on the leg side
Faulkner to Jordan, 1 run slightly outside off and it's steered towards point for one
Faulkner to Morgan, FOUR runs that's it, what a shot, what a hundred! He made room for the fullish delivery and smacked it over the covers for his seventh ODI hundred!
Faulkner to Morgan, FOUR runs touch shorter outside off, he waits and cuts it late to send it for four fine on the off side
Faulkner to Morgan, 1 run outside off, steered square on the off side for one and he keeps strike
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run short ball on the leg side, pulled to deep fine leg for one
Cummins to Jordan, 1 wide slower bouncer on middle and leg, Jordan ducks under it
Cummins to Jordan, 1 leg bye angled into the batsman, deflects off Jordan's inside edge and body for a quick single
Cummins to Morgan, 1 wide length delivery down the leg side for a wide
Cummins to Morgan, 2 runs short of length towards the legs, worked off the hips fine down leg for two more
Cummins to Morgan, 1 run makes room and guides the short of length delivery to third man for one
Cummins to Jordan, FOUR runs incoming delivery takes a thick outside edge and goes past the keeper on the off side for four. No slips there, obviously
Cummins to Jordan, 1 run short and wide, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
Faulkner to Jordan, no run short of length outside off, pushed to point, not time for a run
Faulkner to Jordan, no run from back of the hand and right on the stumps, Jordan blocks it back
Faulkner to Jordan, 2 runs short ball now and it's pulled to deep midwicket for two
Faulkner to Jordan, 2 runs slower ball from the back of the hand, it's full and clipped on the leg side for two more and that's the 50 stand
Faulkner to Jordan, no run accurate yorker on the stumps, Jordan defends it back
Faulkner to Jordan, 5 wide another slow one from the back of the hand, but down the leg side as Jordan looks to slap it on the leg side and it's gone for four byes after hitting Haddin's arm
Faulkner to Jordan, OUT another one caught in the deep and Jordan has given it away. Short on middle and leg and Jordan pulled it straight to Maxwell at deep midwicket

Starc to Morgan, SIX runs that's big, that's another six, his third of the innings! Made room for the incoming delivery, it was full too, he was well in the crease and lofted it high over the long on boundary for six
Starc to Morgan, FOUR runs full outside off now and he drives it firmly in the air just wide of mid off for another boundary! Timing the ball very well, he's middling everything
Starc to Morgan, no run length delivery outside off, steered towards point this time

Starc to Morgan, OUT another easy catch for Maxwell, this time Morgan's gone but after such a counter-attacking innings. He middled this short ball on middle stump with the pull but found Maxi at deep midwicket. What a fighting innings from the captain
Starc to Finn, OUT started the innings with a wicket, and ends with one too! He came round the wicket and darted a yorker right on the off stump, Finn missed it and was bowled first ball

5.50pm That England scorecard looks respectable only because of one man - Eoin Morgan. Starc had them 0 for 2 in this first three balls and they were 69 for 5 some time later because of Cummins and Faulkner. Morgan started slow to consolidate, pushed the run rate over four and then propelled them past 200 with some attractive
6.35pm Chris Woakes has the first new ball for England, two slips for Warner. Here we go...
Woakes to Warner, 1 run draws an edge straightaway as Warner drives uppishly outside off and the edge goes through the gully region for one
Woakes to Finch, 1 run pushes the length delivery from just outside off to mid-on for one
Woakes to Warner, no run full on middle and leg, Warner defends it back
Woakes to Warner, FOUR runs bit too full outside off and Warner crunches it through the covers right in the gap for four
Woakes to Warner, no run length delivery on the stumps, Warner blocks it back
Woakes to Warner, no run bit shorter on the stumps, Warner hops back to work it to leg but plays too early and defends it back
Finn to Finch, no run on length outside off, Finch drives hard on the off side but doesn't middle it
Finn to Finch, no run bit wider outside off on length, pushes to cover this time
Finn to Finch, no run nips it in a little bit from outside off, Finch leans forward and pushes to cover
Finn to Finch, no run on off stump now and Finch pushes it down to mid on
Finn to Finch, no run swings it in from outside off as Finch goes for an extravagant drive and misses it completely
Finn to Finch, FOUR runs on the pads now and Finch cashes in by flicking it off his legs in the gap between mid on and midwicket for a four
Woakes to Warner, no run short of length on the off stump, Warner stays back to defend it on the off side
Woakes to Warner, no run full on middle and leg, checks his on driven a bit as it goes down to mido n
Woakes to Warner, no run beats Warner as this one pitched on leg and moved towards middle. There was an inside edge actually onto the pads
Woakes to Warner, no run he sees room on the off side, goes down on a knee for a powerful drive but misses
Woakes to Warner, no run goes back for the back of length delivery on off and defends it on off
Woakes to Warner, no run towards leg stump now, clipped to midwicket now
Finn to Finch, FOUR runs strays towards the pads again and Finch clips it fine down the leg side for another four. Finn not getting his lines right
Finn to Finch, 1 run outside the off stump now, he guides it to third man for one
Finn to Warner, 2 runs that's gone high in the air, but lands safe, lucky for Warner! He drove the fullish delivery straight up in the air and down the ground, but it just beat mid on for two
Finn to Warner, no run he sees room again, drives again outside off and misses again
Finn to Warner, no run fullish on the off stump and it's crunched down straight to mid off
Finn to Warner, 2 runs another one in the air as Warner drives uppishly outside off and the ball goes wide of point towards third man
Woakes to Finch, no run back of length around off, Finch stays back and defends it back
Woakes to Finch, no run bit wide outside off, Finch drives firmly but it's stopped at short cover with a dive
Woakes to Finch, 1 run length delivery on off is pushed down to mid on with soft hands for a quick single. Direct hit at non-striker's end from Broad and Finch was in trouble
Woakes to Warner, FOUR runs too full outside off and Warner connects with his drive this time! He got room to free his arms and went down on the knee to power it through the covers for four
Woakes to Warner, no run back of length on leg stump, bit of extra bounce surprises Warner
Woakes to Warner, no run bit short of length on leg and he mistimes the pull a bit and finds midwicket
Finn to Finch, no run leans forward and defends the length delivery on the off side
Finn to Finch, FOUR runs dropped by Finn! Finch drove the length delivery back toward the bowler's head and Finn got his hands to it but the ball popped out and went wide of mid off for four
Finn to Finch, no run shortish outside off, Finch pulls this time and misses
Finn to Finch, 1 leg bye angled in towards leg stump, clipped to the leg side for a leg bye
Finn to Warner, no run seams away a bit from middle stump, steered to point off the back foot
Finn to Warner, FOUR runs too full and wide, Warner swings his arms and hits it high in the air using his wrists over the covers for four
Woakes to Finch, no run puts his front foot forward and pushes the length delivery towards cover
Woakes to Watson, 1 run well outside the off stump and Watson slices it to third man for one
Woakes to Warner, no run beats Warner with a back of length delivery that nipped in, cramped him up for room as Warner defended awkwardly and could not get bat to it
Woakes to Warner, no run short of length outside off, he stays back and punches to cover point
Woakes to Warner, 1 run bit full on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket for one
Finn to Warner, no run goes for a slog and misses again! It was fullish and just outside off, Warner heaved on the leg side and missed it
Finn to Warner, no run fullish outside off, pushed into the covers now
Finn to Warner, FOUR runs full and wider now, Warner doesn't go hard at it and merely pushes it over the covers for four
Finn to Warner, 1 run bit slower on middle and leg, clipped off the pads for one past midwicket
Finn to Watson, 1 run back of length and angling in towards the batsman, worked to leg off the back foot for one

Finn to Warner, FOUR runs guides it very well on the off side. Again not using too much power for the wide delivery outside off and he merely got bat on it late enough to send it fine on the off side for four
Woakes to Watson, no run on length outside off, Watson defends it into the covers
Woakes to Watson, no run wider outside off, Watson chops and the ball reaches slip after a bounce
Woakes to Watson, no run bit shorter outside off, Watson goes back and works it to midwicket
Woakes to Watson, no run well outside off, Watson leans forward and drives to cover point
Woakes to Watson, FOUR runs full on off and middle and Watson flicks it beautifully from the middle of the bat with the wrists to the square leg boundary for four
Woakes to Watson, no run outside off again and it's driven straight to cover off the front foot
Broad to Warner, FOUR runs short and wide enough outside off for Warner to punch it off the back foot past a diving cover point for four
Broad to Warner, no run length delivery on middle and leg, Warner blocks it back
Broad to Warner, no run back of length on middle and leg again, he stays back to defend it on off
Broad to Warner, no run length delivery on leg stump, pushed on the leg side by Warner
Broad to Warner, 2 runs wider on the leg side and Warner clips it to deep backward square leg for two
Broad to Warner, no run bit wide outside off now, Warner waits for it and punches it to Bell at point
Jordan to Watson, FOUR runs starts with a wide delivery outside off, Watson had enough time to slice it late past point for four
Jordan to Watson, no run leans forward and defends the length delivery angled in from outside off
Jordan to Watson, 2 runs short of length outside off, Watson rocks back and punches it by getting on top of it, wide of third man for two
Jordan to Watson, 2 runs bit of room again outside off and he guides it past point and wide of third man for two more
Jordan to Watson, 1 run fullish now, still width on offer, and Watson drives it in the air to sweeper cover for one
Jordan to Warner, no run length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
Broad to Watson, 1 run coming in from outside off, Watson leans forward and steers it to third man
Broad to Warner, 2 runs fullish on the legs, clipped off the pads to deep backward square leg for two
Broad to Warner, 3 runs just wide of mid off! Warner drove the length delivery in the air and Morgan ran to his right with a full-length dive but the ball was just out of his reach
Broad to Watson, no run defends the length delivery from outside off to short midwicket
Broad to Watson, no run this one's wide outside off, Watson pulls and misses completely
Broad to Watson, no run waits for this one outside off and steers it straight to point
Jordan to Warner, 1 run short delivery, but not much room and Warner manages to guide it to third man
Jordan to Watson, no run back of length outside off, punched back to the bowler
Jordan to Watson, no run short and wide, cut fiercely off the back foot, but straight to point

Jordan to Watson, OUT Watson pulls again but is caught this time, very good catch by Woakes running in from deep midwicket! Watson pulled the short ball from just outside off and it went very high, Moeen was running in from deep square leg and Woakes from deep midwicket and the latter ran in a long way to grab it with
Jordan to Warner, no run slightly back of length on leg, pushed to the leg side by Warner
Jordan to Warner, no run on length outside the off stump, pushed softly to backward point
Broad to Smith, no run watches the short of length delivery outside off and lets it go
Broad to Smith, no run another one outside off on similar length and left again
Broad to Smith, 1 run on length outside off and it's driven through the covers to get off the mark
Broad to Warner, FOUR runs cheeky shot! Short ball from Broad towards Warner's head, he swayed out of the line and get a faint bit of bat while playing the ramp shot to just clear the keeper
Broad to Warner, FOUR runs length delivery on middle and Warner pushes it off the middle of the bat through the covers in the gap for four more
Broad to Warner, no run length delivery right on middle stump, defended to cover point this time
Jordan to Smith, 1 run goes across a bit and works the length delivery from outside off to the leg side
Jordan to Warner, no run back of length towards the legs, worked off the hips on the leg side
Jordan to Warner, 1 leg bye towards the leg side now and Warner gets a leg bye off the pad
Jordan to Smith, no run goes back in the crease and defends the short of length ball back to the bowler
Jordan to Smith, no run nips it in fro outside off, Smith defends it back again
Jordan to Smith, 1 leg bye goes across a little bit for the back of length delivery angling in and works it to leg for a leg bye
Broad to Smith, 1 run fullish outside off, flicked with the wrists off the back foot to mid on
Broad to Warner, 1 run back of length on leg, worked off the hips to fine leg for one
Broad to Smith, no run leans forward and pushes the length delivery into the covers
Broad to Smith, no run good-length ball is driven into the covers again
Broad to Smith, no run moves across towards off and pushes the ball on off again
Broad to Smith, no run full outside off, whipped with the wrists to mid on. That's drinks
Jordan to Warner, 1 run short ball, Warner pulls and it lands safely in the midwicket region for one
Jordan to Smith, no run that's short and wide, slapped straight to backward point
Jordan to Smith, 1 run goes back and works the incoming delivery to leg for a quick single
Jordan to Warner, 1 run outside the leg stump and it's clipped off the pads for one to bring up his fifty
Jordan to Smith, no run fullish outside off, he drives firmly but an edge goes to mid on
Jordan to Smith, no run gets an edge on the incoming delivery as he tries to work it on leg but it goes on off
Ali to Warner, no run loud appeal for lbw as Warner tries reverse sweep first ball and is hit in front of leg stump. The umpire says no
Ali to Warner, no run bit of flight on the off stump, worked to the leg side
Ali to Warner, 1 run short and flat towards leg, worked behind square on leg for one
Ali to Smith, no run comes down and pushes the fullish ball to mid on
Ali to Smith, no run waits for it to turn and defends the ball to midwicket
Ali to Smith, 1 run flighted on middle, he comes down and drives to long on for one
Jordan to Smith, 1 run back of length outside off and it's worked behind square on leg for one
Jordan to Warner, 1 run bit too wide outside off and it's clipped on the leg side for one
Jordan to Smith, 1 run on length on the legs, clipped off the pads towards fine leg for one
Jordan to Warner, FOUR runs bit wide outside off, Warner chases tentatively and gets a thick outside edge as there's no slips
Jordan to Warner, 1 run waits for it outside off and guides it to deep backward point for one
Jordan to Smith, no run short and wide outside off, slapped off the back foot but point dives to save a few runs
Ali to Warner, 1 run short of length on middle, worked to leg off the back foot for one
Ali to Smith, 1 run flighted outside off, he comes down and drives to long on for one
Ali to Warner, no run length delivery towards off stump, Warner leaves forward and blocks
Ali to Warner, 1 run comes down this time and flicks to deep midwicket with the wrists
Ali to Smith, 1 run comes down and pushes it back past the bowler for one more
Ali to Warner, 1 run shorter and flatter outside off, steered through the point region for one
Jordan to Warner, FOUR runs short ball towards Warner and he pulls it powerfully towards deep midwicket where Root runs a lot from square leg but can't cut it off
Jordan to Warner, 2 runs short and wide outside off now, Warner doesn't move his feet much and slaps it behind point for two
Jordan to Warner, FOUR runs another short ball down the leg side, Warner pulls awkwardly and gets a bit of bat as it goes down fine leg for four
Jordan to Warner, no run length delivery just outside off, he punches it off the back foot towards mid-off
Jordan to Warner, 1 run short of length on middle stump, Warner waits for it and guides it towards point
Jordan to Smith, no run length delivery outside off and he drives it down to mid on
Ali to Warner, no run full outside off and it's pushed back to the bowler
Ali to Warner, no run flighted on middle and leg, full again, Warner pushes it back to Moeen's right
Ali to Warner, 1 run comes down this time and whips the ball from middle and leg towards backward square leg
Ali to Smith, no run Smith comes down too and pushes the ball back to Moeen
Ali to Smith, 3 runs going down leg and Smith paddles it without bending much fine down the leg side and they run like rabbits for three
Ali to Warner, no run on length outside off, driven into the covers
Bopara to Smith, 1 run fullish around the off stump, driven down to long on for one
Bopara to Warner, 1 run slightly slow outside the off stump, pushed to sweeper cover for one
Bopara to Smith, 1 run angling in from around off, helped with the angle to the leg side for one
Bopara to Warner, 2 runs oh, that was a chance but very tough! Warner drove outside off, got an edge but it deflected off the keeper's gloves for two
Bopara to Warner, no run length delivery outside off and it's pushed into the covers
Bopara to Warner, no run length delivery outside off, steered to backward point off the back foot
Ali to Smith, SIX runs that's gone high, that's all the way! He came down the track and smacked it over the long off boundary for a six from outside off
Ali to Smith, 1 run tossed up around off, whipped to the leg side for one
Ali to Warner, no run comes down a bit and pushes the ball to cover
Ali to Warner, 1 run goes back this time for the incoming delivery and works it to leg for one
Ali to Smith, no run presses forward and blocks it on off
Ali to Smith, 1 run turning in towards middle and leg, helped with the turn behind square on leg for one
Bopara to Smith, no run outside the off stump, steered straight to backward point
Bopara to Smith, FOUR runs incoming delivery towards the leg side and Smith helped it along the angle by guiding it fine down the leg side for four
Bopara to Smith, 2 runs outside off now and it's steered past point for two more. Can't do much when these two want to run two
Bopara to Smith, 1 run length delivery is driven through the covers for one
Bopara to Warner, 1 run fullish on middle and leg, driven down to long on for one
Bopara to Smith, no run not too wide outside off, steered towards point off the front foot
Ali to Warner, 1 run comes down to take it on the full and drives it down to long off. The two even exchanged high fives while taking the run
Ali to Smith, 1 wide strays down the leg side for a wide
Ali to Smith, no run comes down and whips the ball to leg
Ali to Smith, FOUR runs slightly over pitched and Smith smacks it like a sweep and gets four on the midwicket boundary for four
Ali to Smith, 1 run
Ali to Warner, no run pitched up on off, pushed back to the bowler
Ali to Warner, 1 run comes down the track and powers it down to long off for one
Finn to Warner, FOUR runs short ball on the leg side and Warner pulls it to the deep backward square leg boundary for four
Finn to Warner, no run length delivery on off, pushed towards the covers
Finn to Warner, 1 run good short ball on middle, Warner jumps to steer the ball to third man
Finn to Smith, no run pushes the length delivery into the covers off the front foot
Finn to Smith, 1 run thick edge as Smith looks to work it on leg but gets a single past point
Finn to Warner, no run room with the short ball outside off, it's smashed straight to backward point
Ali to Smith, no run turning in from off, Smith helps it to midwicket
Ali to Smith, 1 run comes down the track and whips the ball to fine leg for one
Ali to Warner, 1 run run out chance! Warner made some room first and then steered it towards point, Smith was way out of his crease when the ball went past the non-striker's end for an overthrow
Ali to Smith, 1 run flighted on off, he drives it down to long-on for one
Ali to Warner, 1 run strays towards the pads and Warner and he works it past square leg

Finn to Warner, 2 runs another run out chance missed! Warned pulled the short ball to deep midwicket, there was hesitation after the first run from both batsmen but they went ahead with the second and the inaccurate throw helped Bailey at the non-striker's end. Finn was also not standing behind the stumps
Finn to Warner, 1 run short of length ball, worked towards midwicket for one
Finn to Bailey, no run that's bouncer just outside off, first of the over
Finn to Bailey, no run length delivery just outside off, defended back to the bowler
Finn to Bailey, no run back of length outside the off stump, he defends off the back foot
Finn to Bailey, 1 run short ball angled in, Bailey pulls it wide of deep fine leg for one
Ali to Bailey, no run fullish on off, worked straight to midwicket
Ali to Bailey, no run comes down the track and clips the ball from outside off to leg
Ali to Bailey, no run helps the turning delivery to short fine leg off the back foot
Ali to Bailey, no run goes back and across and flicks the ball to midwicket
Ali to Bailey, 1 run comes down and drives the ball down to long on for one
Ali to Warner, 2 runs stays back and punches the shortish delivery outside off, it goes just wide of long off and they run two more
Finn to Bailey, no run length delivery outside off, he defends the ball back to the bowler
Finn to Bailey, no run shorter delivery towards the batsman, he goes on his toes and defends it
Finn to Bailey, no run outside off and it's driven down to mid off
Finn to Bailey, no run on length outside off, he pushes it into the covers
Finn to Bailey, no run on length on the off stump, Bailey defends it back
Finn to Bailey, no run slightly short of length outside off, Bailey defends off the back foot
Ali to Warner, no run yorks Warner on the middle stump, he digs it out on the off side
Ali to Warner, no run fullish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
Ali to Warner, no run full and well outside off, driven firmly but straight to cover
Ali to Warner, 1 run bit closer to the off stump, pushed past cover for one
Ali to Bailey, 1 run he works the ball with the turn to the leg side for one
Ali to Warner, 1 run goes back and makes room, steers the ball into the covers for one more
Finn to Warner, FOUR runs full and wide, you can't bowl there to Warner! He goes down on a knee and smashes it over the covers for a cracking four. He was smiling while playing that shot!
Finn to Warner, 1 run short of length delivery outside off, Warner doesn't middle the cut and gets one towards point
Finn to Bailey, no run length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
Finn to Bailey, 1 run short of length delivery is pulled on the leg side for one
Finn to Warner, 1 run short ball coming in, Warner pulls it to the leg side and gets only one
Finn to Bailey, no run wants to drive the length delivery from off into the covers but gets an edge and it goes to mid on
Ali to Warner, no run full delivery is pushed back to Moeen
Ali to Warner, no run comes down and pushes the length delivery into the covers
Ali to Warner, FOUR runs poor delivery down the leg side, swept fine to the fine leg area for four and that's his hundred, third in ODIs, and fourth international hundred since early December
Ali to Warner, 2 runs short and flat, he makes some room and cuts it past point for two
Ali to Warner, 1 run comes down the track and pushes the ball to long off for one
Ali to Bailey, no run loud appeal for lbw from the keeper and bowler as Bailey looked to sweep it across the line, missed and it was pretty close. But no says the umpire. That's time for a drink
Woakes to Warner, 2 leg byes Warner makes room, Woakes chases him and he gets two leg byes down the leg side
Woakes to Warner, no run fullish outside off, pushed firmly down the ground to mid off
Woakes to Warner, no run makes room, goes for a big heave and misses the incoming length delivery
Woakes to Warner, FOUR runs short ball, Warner pulls handsomely and collects for more from the midwicket boundary. Short or full, you can't bowl to him there
Woakes to Warner, 1 leg bye Woakes chases Warner again as he makes room, another leg bye on the leg side off the pads
Woakes to Bailey, FOUR runs short ball to Bailey too, and he smacks it to the midwicket boundary along the ground off the back foot
Broad to Warner, 1 run full just outside off, Warner drives it over Bailey's head towards long off for one
Broad to Bailey, 1 run seams it in from outside off, Bailey gets a thick outside edge for one on the off side
Broad to Warner, 1 run slightly short of length outside off, slapped towards long on for one
Broad to Bailey, no run short ball outside off, Bailey pulls it but not from the middle to mid on
Broad to Bailey, 1 run short and wide, cut to point off the back foot for one
Broad to Warner, 1 run full and outside off, punched down the ground to long off for one
Woakes to Warner, 1 leg bye tries a heave on the leg side, misses and gets a leg bye on the off side
Woakes to Warner, 1 run on length outside off, crunched into the covers for one
Woakes to Maxwell, no run charges down, makes room and slaps the short ball to cover point at the edge of the circle

Woakes to Maxwell, OUT there's a loud appeal for caught behind and he's gone! It was a fullish delivery outside off, Maxi poked without much footwork, the keeper and bowler went up and so did the umpire's finger! But replays and HotSpot confirm there was no edge, the sound was of the bat hitting the ground
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run incoming delivery towards the stumps, helped to the leg side for one
Broad to Haddin, FOUR runs fullish on the off stump, Haddin smacks it straight down the ground over the umpire'a head for four!
Broad to Haddin, FOUR runs and another one! Short ball follows the full delivery and this one is pulled wide of the deep midwicket fielder for four
Broad to Haddin, FOUR runs oh, what a shot! He made room, the ball was coming in towards leg stump and he cut it fiercely past point for four
Broad to Haddin, 1 run
Broad to Warner, FOUR runs full on the leg stump, Warner heaves it to the wide long on boundary for another cracking four!
Broad to Warner, 1 run full outside off now, steered to cover for one
Woakes to Warner, FOUR runs it's full, it's smacked, it's four! Cleared his front foot out of the way and cleared the mid on fielder
Woakes to Warner, no run that's a switch hit, but he doesn't connect well. Changed the grip of the bat and could not clear the leg side in field
Woakes to Warner, FOUR runs stays left-handed this time and gets a full toss to smash it over the fine leg boundary for four. Might have been a no ball, but not given
Woakes to Haddin, 1 run full outside off, driven easily to sweeper cover for one
Woakes to Faulkner, FOUR runs slightly short outside off, Faulkner slaps it right between mid on and midwicket for four. Bonus point becomes easy now
Broad to Haddin, no run makes a bit of room and pushes the length ball back to the bowler
Broad to Haddin, 1 run full toss on the pads and it's clipped on the leg side for one
Broad to Faulkner, no run charges down the track and Broad angles it in, Faulkner pokes and misses

Broad to Faulkner, OUT oh, that's chaos, that's just poor stuff from Australia as Haddin is run out! Faulkner dug out the full delivery to short midwicket, Haddin was already halfway down the track and Bopara ran to the non-striker's end with the ball to run him out
Broad to Faulkner, 2 runs it's done now, Faulkner makes sure there are no more stutters as he slaps the ball just over Bopara at short midwicket for two and Australia do get the bonus point

9.35pm What was going to be an easy win turned out to be stressful as Australia chased the bonus point. The target wasn't that steep on this pitch and Warner's hundred made sure they got there within 40 overs to start the series on a great note. What actually set it up for them was two wickets in the first three balls of the
That's all we have from the first match of the series. Join us again on Sunday for the Australia-India clash at the MCG - 2.20pm local time. Until then it's goodbye from Vishal Dikshit. Adi?s!
Time for the presentation:
Australia won by 3 wickets (with 61 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Mitchell Starc, AUS
